info.name: elliptic curves
info.description:
y² = x³ + kx +a
k = mouse.x   y = mouse.y

renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 2.*(2.*u - R ) / R.y,
         M = iMouse.z<=0. ? vec2( cos(iTime), sin(.314*iTime) ) // demo
                         : 2.* iMouse.xy/R - 1.;                // control
    float k = M.x, a = M.y, x = U.x, y = U.y, 
          v =  y*y - x*x*x - k*x - a;                           // field
    O = vec4( abs(v)/fwidth(v) );                               // isovalue 0
}
renderpass.name: Image
